description: The Cavalry Captain of the Knights of Favonius, Kaeya is a Cryo sword user who excels at applying Cryo and enabling powerful reactions.
info: Kaeya is a flexible Cryo support and sub-DPS who can apply Cryo frequently and enable Freeze or Melt teams. Build him for Energy Recharge, CRIT, and Cryo DMG Bonus.

skills.name: Normal Attack: Ceremonial Bladework
skills.desc: Performs up to 5 rapid strikes with a sword.
skills.details_html:
Normal Attack
Performs up to 5 rapid strikes with a sword.
Charged Attack
Consumes stamina to unleash two rapid sword strikes.
Plunging Attack
Plunges from mid-air to strike the ground below, dealing AoE DMG upon impact.

skills.name: Frostgnaw
skills.desc: Kaeya unleashes a frigid blast, dealing Cryo DMG to enemies in front of him.
skills.details_html:
Frostgnaw
Unleashes a frigid blast, dealing Cryo DMG to enemies in front of Kaeya.

skills.name: Glacial Waltz
skills.desc: Kaeya summons three icicles that revolve around him, dealing Cryo DMG to enemies they touch.
skills.details_html:
Glacial Waltz
Summons three icicles that revolve around Kaeya, dealing Cryo DMG to enemies they touch. Lasts for 8s.

passive_talents.name: Cold-Blooded Strike
passive_talents.desc: Every hit with Frostgnaw regenerates HP for Kaeya equal to 15% of his ATK.

passive_talents.name: Glacial Heart
passive_talents.desc: Enemies frozen by Frostgnaw will drop additional Elemental Particles.

passive_talents.name: Hidden Strength
passive_talents.desc: Decreases sprinting Stamina consumption for your own party members by 20%.

constellations.name: Excellent Blood
constellations.desc: The CRIT Rate of Kaeya's Normal and Charge Attacks against enemies affected by Cryo is increased by 15%.

constellations.name: Never-Ending Performance
constellations.desc: Every time Glacial Waltz defeats an enemy during its duration, its duration is increased by 2.5s, up to a maximum of 15s.

constellations.name: Dance of Frost
constellations.desc: Increases the Level of Frostgnaw by 3. Maximum upgrade level is 15.

constellations.name: Frozen Kiss
constellations.desc: Triggers automatically when Kaeya's HP falls below 20%: Creates a shield that absorbs damage equal to 30% of his Max HP for 20s. Can only occur once every 60s.

constellations.name: Frostbiting Embrace
constellations.desc: Increases the Level of Glacial Waltz by 3. Maximum upgrade level is 15.

constellations.name: Glacial Whirlwind
constellations.desc: Glacial Waltz will generate 1 additional icicle and will regenerate 15 Energy when cast.
